footer.acknowledgement: The B.C. Public Service acknowledges the territories of First Nations around B.C. and is grateful to carry out our work on these lands. We acknowledge the rights, interests, priorities, and concerns of all Indigenous Peoples — First Nations, Métis, and Inuit — respecting and acknowledging their distinct cultures, histories, rights, laws, and governments.
footer.contact1: We can help in over 220 languages and through other accessible options.

homeView.cantNavigate: Please contact and administrator to verify your permissions

enquiryConfirmationView.confirmationBanner: Your enquiry has been successfully submitted.

electrification.message: An Electrification Navigator will review your submission and contact you in 2 business days. Please check your email for the confirmation email and keep the enquiry ID for future reference.

housing.message: A Housing Navigator will review your submission and contact you in 2 business days. Please check your email for the confirmation email and keep the enquiry ID for future reference.

electrification.projectsTooltip: Submit an electrification project to the Navigator service to find out what permits are required for your projects, track permit applications, and submit related enquiries.

initiativeView.enquiriesTooltip: General enquiries are for questions that are not related to existing projects. To enquire about an existing project, select the project from “My projects” and enquire there.

general.projectsTooltip: Submit a general project to the Navigator service to find out what permits are required for your projects, track permit applications, and submit related enquiries.

housing.projectsTooltip: Submit a housing project to the Navigator service to find out what permits are required for your projects, track permit applications, and submit related enquiries.

electrification.message: Your submission will be reviewed and you will be contacted by an Electrification Navigator in 2 business days. Please check your email for the confirmation email and keep the project ID for future reference.

housing.message: Your submission will be reviewed and you will be contacted by a Housing Navigator in 2 business days. Please check your email for the confirmation email and keep the project ID for future reference.

projectView.disclaimer: Based on the information you provided, the following permits are recommended. projectView.relatedEnquiriesDesc: Any project-related enquiries you or a team member have submitted through the Navigator Service website will appear on this page. You can submit an enquiry about this project to your assigned Navigator by clicking the 'Ask my Navigator' button in the top-right corner.

collectionDisclaimer.disclaimer: This information is being collected under the legal authority of section 26 (c)(e) and 27 (1)(a)(i) of the Freedom of Information and Protection of Privacy Act (the Act) and is being used for the purpose of creating a client relationship between you or your organization and Government of British Columbia. It may also be shared when strictly necessary with partner agencies that are also subject to the provisions of the Act. Personal information may be used by the Permitting Solutions Branch for survey purposes. If you have any questions regarding the use of this personal information, please contact the Navigator Service at
collectionDisclaimer.header: Notice for collection, use and disclosure of personal information
